subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Unknown. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} connected {{och-l|橘|tr=kwit}} to {{cog|km|tr=kwic|t=[[tangerine]]}} and also deemed as "less likely" connections to {{m|km|ក្រូច||[[citrus]]}} and {{w|Bahnaric_languages#North_Bahnaric|Proto}}-{{w|Hre language|Hre}}-{{w|Sedanglanguage|Sedang}} *'''kruč''' (Bodman, 1980). However, {{zh-ref|Alves (2018)}} considered the Old Chinese word's {{w|Proto-Austroasiatic language|Austroasiatic}} origin likely, and compared it to {{cog|mkh-pro|*kruuc|*kruuc ~ kruəc}}.
